Great FPS game, but only if you have a steam account with other paid games as well as lots of friends and experience in any community. If you dont have any of that, then i wouldnt recommend it due to the low trust factor you will have as it looks at your steam account to see if you are new to steam and etc.

Well a lot of people said that this game would be dead in 2019 because of not enough attention by Valve, well they were wrong. Because this game is has been a solid competitor in Competitive FPS genre. I'll give this a good review, but there is a negative side. 

When CS:GO reaches 1 Million player in 2020 New year, things are not doing well. With bugs in place like FPS drop for Intel HD Graphics Owner, Money oriented ( in my opinion ), still haven't implemented 128 Tick, and many more problems that have occured during the early days of CS until now. And they even didnt test their update and send the update straight away.

I hope this game gets fixed, i dont care about cases (cuz i cant afford em ) and it gets more attention. Btw fix the FPS DROP IMMEDIATELY FFS VALVE.
